skins.shipDescription: Mogami-class heavy cruiser number three ¨C Suzuya.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Suzuya, third ship of the Mogami class. During that war, I fought alongside Mogami as a member of CruDiv 7. My last battle left me with a bit of regret... but I've been given a new beginning on this battlefield, and I'll fight alongside my new companions with a fresh outlook. I look forward to working with you.
skins.acquisition: I am Suzuya, Mogami-class heavy cruiser. I place myself under your command from this day forward.
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. Which job should we take on first?
skins.details: Commander? Oh, I'm just preparing for the next lecture at the auditorium. Please don't worry about me, and continue your work as normal.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander is looking at... N-nothing, don't worry about it!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Kumano, please don't make trouble for Mogami, all right? She's going to get a stomachache again...
skins.secretaryIdle3: We're sometimes called the Suzuya class, but I still prefer being called the Mogami class. We all fought together during that war after all..
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander... where do you think you're looking? Don't think I wouldn't notice... I could feel your gaze boring into me... Am I right?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Nnh... So this is what you were after from the very beginning... I knew it all along. I've always known, this entire time... Ehehehe~?
